text: Maga allahane eka kavala pathavila, jo jamina khodata hota, yasathi ki tyala he dakhavave ki, apalya mrta bhavace preta tyane kasa prakare lapavave. To mhanu lagala, arere! Kheda ahe majhyavara! Kaya mi ase karanyayogyahi rahilo nahi ki apalya bhavace preta ya kavalyapramane jaminita gadu sakalo asato? Maga tara to khupa duhkhi ani lajjita jhala
